## NodeEulerRotationTrack.getDuration() method

Get the intrinsic duration of this track in seconds.

Used by clips to determine overall clip duration and looping behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDuration(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

Track duration (seconds).
